name: Refrigerator LG GBB62SWHMN White
origAbout: In efforts to save nature, LG created the best Inverter Linear Compressor™ refrigerator. With LINEARCooling™ and DoorCooling⁺™ technology, NatureFRESH™ keeps foods naturally fresh through precise temperature control. The LG Inverter Linear Compressor helps maintain the appearance and taste of fresh products for longer by reducing temperature fluctuations. The LG Inverter Linear Compressor helps maintain the appearance and taste of fresh products for longer by reducing temperature fluctuations. Tall fridge freezer with bottom mount: compact & slim combo fridge. LG Tall fridge freezers are big on the inside but compact on the outside, so all the food you need is there at your fingertips. Find your Tall fridge freezer and find a stylish solution to your kitchen.
